    • random

      public static BubbleType random(Rng rand, long spawnIndex, int retry, Environment env)
      Returns a random bubble from the bubbles initialized in init().
      Parameters:
      rand - The random instance used for the bubble system e.g. bubbleblaster:bubble_system from the initDefaults in Gamemode.
      Returns:
      A random bubble.
